content: $FCEL I’m equally annoyed when bears come out of their den when we are down as when bulls start calling for $50 EOW when there is an uptrend. Buy and hold. It’s that simple.
$FCEL Bears coming out of their dens today folks. Haha, all you can do is smile. 🤤
@LongJohnStonkton $FCEL isn’t EV for God’s sake people.
$FCEL sucker is being held underwater. Patience will win here. Bullish

$FCEL need opinions @nick20000 @JasonFew on the proposed authorized share increase...

1. Do you think some of these will be built into employee packages? Are they already telling us this (haven’t read the entire proxy). 

2. Do we have any idea how much debt we are in, if so, could this increase wipe it away? Or by how much?

3. What’s your 1–10 confidence that this will be put to good use?

Anyone is free to respond, I just tagged my favorite StockTwats Bullish
@winwin21 this has been out for weeks. It means nothing. It’s not trading near $.07 right now
$FCEL 38 million volume ain’t shit. Wait until Monday
@thevamp @Mkohl1 not necessarily. Yes you will “win” but it is worth the risk if gamma smacks dat a$$ and you make $.10?
$FCEL added 50 because why not?
@Midwit $FCEL doesnt do EVs
@TayTayXCIII but then $FCEL is anything but typical. 😉

$FCEL my technical analysis would show a bullish trend, with a high volume down day tomorrow, driving the price down into the high $24-low $25 range at close. 

This is healthy pull back folks. We’ll see a high volume uptrend next week into the mid $30s. Bullish
@ChantalFX can I pay in $DOGE.X ? 🤤

@Lsky7 I have no position on this one for good reason. There are two front-runners in this sector, $FCEL AND $PLUG. Everything else is running with the sector. I’ve done my DD and I’m just not in a position to risk that much with a company whose CelEO is public ally pumping the SP.
@ChantalFX @MyOpinion002 I’ve been holding 20K shares since $.30. Bullish
@ChantalFX @MyOpinion002 I understand. Tread carefully. Confidence can’t exist in the market. Doing your DD is very important, but remember, $FCEL is currently running on no news.
@W3027193 sell off and put it all in $FCEL
@dingis I wouldn’t. It’s not going to be down for long. Wait for $PLUG to climb back up and this will be right there with it. Bullish
$FCEL $10 price target for JPM Chase...you guys missed the boat, eh?
$FCEL holding in the 19s...Happy Camper over here. 🤤
@NKLAMVP don’t listen to this guy. $ENG is not going anywhere. Bearish

$FCEL for everyone expecting a jump next week...remember the tax year is coming to an end. Lots of profits will be taken and the SP will be going down (mid 9s, no doubt)!until after the new year. 

I see everyone hooting and hollering about next week. Just set your expectations. It’s going to continue to climb up and set new highs, just not next week. There will be too many people signing off on their 2020 capital gains. Bullish
$FCEL rocket ship, rocket ship

$FCEL Bears out here in full force this morning...get a life folks. Kong’s are here to stay, see ya’ll when we’re back in the teens...except I won’t because y’all will be hiding again just like when we made the run to $11. Bullish

$FCEL $2.55 EOW
$3.70 new high in the weeks to follow. 
Nature of the beast. Buy more now or sell at the new high and get back in. After it tops out we’ll be back down to $2.95 before the next jump. Bullish
$FCEL sold everything yesterday at $2.80. Going to get back in on the dip. $2.40s again coming soon
@Calivapor short term $AYTU ... long term $FCEL   the latter has a much higher ceiling
$FCEL who is buying $2.50 calls for Friday?? 🤤

$FCEL unfortunately FCEL is tied into the gas/oil sector in many ETFs and mutual funds. Scaredy cats selling those off are driving the price. Hope this clears up the people wondering how we’re tied to oil and gas. That along with the CV scare is what is keeping this balloon underwater. It’s funny because the people who SHOULD be long, investing in ETFs and mutual funds, are the ones pulling out too early.

$FCEL don’t worry about CV scare, don’t worry about this false “recession”. The value of this stock is much higher, and will be much higher as we approach the election. Hold strong guys/gals. Rome wasn’t built in a day. Bullish
@minicus I grabbed $153,000 today off the $NRBO jump. Only took a month.
@minicus I’m in long of $FCEL but have buddies who says it “isn’t moving fast enough for them.” There’s some situations for fast money and some for long
@nick20000 just a heads up. This isn’t $FCEL. It’s fuel cell technology in general. A lot of people see “fuel cell” and assume it’s this stock. Make sure you do your DD
$PCG Are we worried at all about a pump-n-dump? Or is this the real deal?
$PCG my calls for Friday at $15 aren’t looking too bad right now. AH and Pre-Market boosting this sucker to the moon!
$PCG calm down boys DONT SELL judge approves and we’ll ride to the moon!
$PCG a deal will be done after close tomorrow. Another day of manipulation is in the works. I’m holding. See you at $18 Bullish
